archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: EudraVigilance (V+H)
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
EudraVigilance er systemet for å administrere og analysere informasjon om mistanke om bivirkninger av legemidler som er godkjent eller er gjenstand for kliniske studier i EØS. Det europeiske legemiddelkontoret (EMA) driver systemet på vegne av EUs lovverk for legemidler.
Human: The EudraVigilance Human is a system for managing and analysing information on suspected adverse reactions to medicines which have been authorised in the European Economic Area. Veterinary: EudraVigilance Veterinary is the European data-processing network and database management system for the exchange, processing, and evaluation of Suspected Adverse Events related to veterinary medicinal products authorised in the European Economic Area.
